record.id: field.name="chart.break.down.by" and file.name="inbox" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: chart.break.down.by
record.file.name: inbox

brief.brief: The field you want to monitor in the chart.
The value must be the name of a field from the Table specified on the Query Definition tab.

detail.detail: When the data source type is Aggregate Query, the chart will show how many records share the same value for the field.
When the data source type is Simple Query, the chart will show the value of the field for each record in the recordset. In this case, the field must be a date/time or numeric field.
